TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Binding extends System.Web.Services.Description.NamedItem
Public NotInheritable Class Binding Inherits NamedItem

summary.span: 指定用於 XML Web Service 中的具體資料格式和通訊協定。

span.span: Specifies the concrete data format and protocols used in the XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Binding`類別會對應至 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL)``加上的根項目``項目。The `Binding` class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `` element enclosed by the root `` element. 如需有關 WSDL 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples 下列範例示範的典型用法`Binding`類別。The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `Binding` class.
